nodes.text: The sneak attack on Roche was a surprise assault that took place during the Clone Wars, a galactic conflict fought between the Galactic Republic and Separatist Alliance, on the Mid Rim astronomical object of Roche at some point between 21 BBY and 19 BBY. Despite having missed the previous invasion of Saleucami, the Dressellian smuggler Has Obitt was caught in the middle of the sneak attack.
The sneak attack on Roche was mentioned in the 2016 novel Catalyst: A Rogue One Novel, written by James Luceno.
